item.title: The Extensive Influence of the Beauty From Utility
item.description: 1 Utility is one of the principal sources of beauty. A house’s convenience gives regular pleasure to the spectator. He is as much hurt when he sees its inconvenience, such as: windows of different shapes, or the door in a wrong place. The fitness of any system or machine for its intended purpose gives a certain propriety and beauty on the whole. It renders its very thought agreeable. 2 David Hume has recently answered most deeply, clearly, eloquently, and elegantly why utility pleases.

item.title: The Morality from Utiltiy
item.description: 12 The following can promote or disturb individual and societal happiness: the characters of people contrivances of art the institutions of government.
